<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Gecko's Grip](/Feats.aspx?ID=1058) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lizardfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=226" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 59 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Cliffscale Lizardfolk](/Heritages.aspx?ID=49) heritage

</column>

---

You stick to walls with a preternatural grip. You gain a climb Speed of 15 feet.
name: Gecko's Grip
